title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library for pulling, running, and managing quantized LLMs locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async wrapper for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (npm: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI (Docker-ready) that proxies to local Ollama instances.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM SDK (Maven Central) providing typed clients and Spring Boot starters for Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with native streaming.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Rust CLI that brings GitHub-Copilot-style autocomplete to any editor via Ollama.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes, Raspberry Pi, and serverless stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for running Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stacks adding Open-WebUI, PostgreSQL, and Traefik to Ollama.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Lightweight Go CLI that turns any Ollama model into a GPT-3.5-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration (PyPI: haystack-ollama) enabling Ollama models for generative QA pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK (NuGet: OllamaSharp) with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines (GitHub Actions, GitLab).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing retrieval-augmented generation with Ollama embeddings and ChromaDB.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python bot bringing Ollama chat, image-to-text, and moderation to Discord servers.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses local Ollama models for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama binaries and NixOS modules with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering typed async client and axum extractors for Ollama endpoints.
